name: Terranova (illuminesce)
description:
Terranova is an interactive fiction game set in the early 2000's about a post-apocalyptic roleplaying community on "LimeJournal." Follow the lives of ephemeralsmile, cherrygoround and sendaria as you befriend them, write stories together, and discover yourself in the process through a rich world of storytelling, love and friendship.

  • Did you have a LiveJournal back in the day?
  • Did you spend your days and nights reading and writing fanfic for your favorite anime?
  • Does lemon and lime mean something more than citrus to you?

If any of these apply to you, my friend...you've come to the right place.

Terranova is currently in ongoing development, and is in its alpha release. There may be some bugs here and there—and if you're interested in providing feedback, please join our community on Discord.

** Because this is the alpha, we are using placeholder original/fanart of some popular titles from the 90's. We believe in paying artists and crediting others. We are currently trying to find the fan artists to ask for permission or take them down if requested. If you know the fan artists used in our alpha release and they are NOT credited, please let us know and we will reach out to them for negotiation.
